description: UPDATE: added percentage of what other users answered to the questions. It got a lot more interesting now!  Would you rather be the richest person in the world, or the most beautiful person in the world?   Have fun with friends and family, at a party or by yourself with this addictive game that challenges your imagination.  Based on the original Would You Rather games, this one will give you only the most select questions, and will get the most out of your personality when playing with friends.  Even when you play alone, you can share the questions through email!  Enjoy the game, and send any ideas of improvements at me@balanalina.info
